hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct(p) from Profissional p right join fetch p.horarioAtendimento ha join fetch ha.programacoes prog where prog.diaSemana = :diaSemana order by p.nome
select p from Profissional p where lower(p.nome) like lower(:nome) order by p.nome
select p from Profissional p left join p.horarioAtendimento where p.papelProfissional = :papelProfissional and p.ativo = :ativo order by p.nome
